pxchat.net
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.Client

public final class Client
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements the client for pxchat. Only one instance is available to the application. It can be obtained by calling getInstance().

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

          A list of image receivers that receive images from the server.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static Client getInstance()
Returns the sole instance of the TCP client.

Returns:
The instance of the TCP client

connect

public void connect(java.lang.String host,
                    int port,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String password)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
Connects to the specified host on the defined port. It uses the login credentials to establish a connection.

Parameters:
host - The host to connect to
port - The port of the end-point
name - The login name
password - The login password
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - If the host cannot be found
java.io.IOException - If there was an error concerning the connection

public void disconnect()
Disconnects the client.

the nextImageID

Returns the connection state of the client.

Returns:
true if it is connected
